name: Armored Warfare - Age of Rage Battle Path Access
detailed_description:
Gear up. Level up. Unlock amazing rewards. The Age of Rage Battle Path is yours to dominate.

The Battle Path is your affordable key to 60 levels of epic rewards, including tanks, containers, skins, Premium time, Gold, and more! Complete the new Age of Rage objectives to earn Battle Coins that can be used to advance through the levels. Incredible content awaits you at every new level – the more you play, the more you get!

Unlock the Age of Rage Battle Path to earn the following rewards:
  • Tanks (Level 5, 7, and 10)
  • Premium time (up to 37 days)
  • Containers (6 Special and 10 Elite)
  • Gold (up to 900)
  • Credits (up to 50,000,000)
  • Decals
  • Camouflages (1 for each environment)
  • Level 10 tank skins
  • Avatars and titles
  • Elite skin and flag

The Armored Warfare – Age of Rage Battle Path is only available for 90 days. Start working through the levels now to earn as many epic rewards as possible!

DISCLAIMER: Battle Path access is available via this DLC bundle, and can also be purchased in-game using the Steam Wallet. Purchasing Battle Path access twice does not provide double rewards. If you accidentally purchased access twice (in-game and through this DLC bundle), please contact our customer support team.

short_description: Gear up. Level up. Earn amazing rewards. Begin your Battle Path today to unlock access to up to 60 levels of epic in-game content, including new tanks, Premium time, containers, elite skins, and more!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (x32), Windows 7/8/10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core2Duo CPU 6700 @ 2.66GHz (2 CPUs), ~2.7GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9500 GT 512 MB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 34 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (x32), Windows 7/8/10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4440 CPU @ 3.10GHz (4 CPUs), ~3.1GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 275 896 MB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
